price: او هغوى د غرونو په هكله درنه پوښتنه كوي، نو ورته وايه چې زما رب به يې ټوټه ټوټه والوزوي.
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
